snippet: The City Council of Ellisville voted 5 to 1 on Monday to remove its mayor, Adam Paul, 32, with whom it began feuding almost as soon as he took office last April.
abstract: City Council of Ellisville, Mo, votes to impeach Mayor Adam Paul, with whom it began feuding almost as soon as he took office in April 2012.
lead_paragraph: The City Council of Ellisville voted 5 to 1 on Monday to remove its mayor, Adam Paul, 32, with whom it began feuding almost as soon as he took office last April.

headline.main: Missouri: Mayor Impeached in Feud With City Council
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Mayor Impeached In Feud With City Council
